long_description: The DAKINE Pyramid Studs easily stick on your board and provide great traction when getting off the lift. Package of 9 studs; studs can be arranged in any pattern on your board-custom stompad! Pyramid studs provide a surface for you to clean the bottom or your boots-even deep tread-quickly and easily. Peel-and-stick application fits all boards. Made of plated aluminum to endure punishment.
short_description: The DAKINE Pyramid Studs easily stick on your board and provide great traction when getting off the lift.
